content: मत्कुणः {@--1@} A bug; मत्कुणाविव पुरा परिप्लवौ <ls>Śi. 14. 68.</ls> {@--2@} An elephant without tusks {@--3@} A small elephant. {@--4@} A beardless man. {@--5@} A buffalo. {@--6@} The cocoa-nut tree. {@--7@} A flea. --णं An armour for the legs or the thighs. --णी Pudendum (of a young girl).
